SummaryEnglish: Chitose is a teenage boy who has no parents, and lives alone. He gets bad grades and eats instant meals. Five of Chitose's teachers decide that they want to be the ones to raise him, they want to be his moms. Chitose is tortured daily by these "moms", and it seem they're trying to kill him! But in some strange way, he feels lonely when they're not around. But can he deal with their study crazy trials, "expiriments", whiny ways, and the students surrounding him at school at the same time?

11.TitleEnglish: HAPPY★LESSON OVA - Uki Uki * Koyomi On Stage

12.TitleEnglish: HAPPY★LESSON OVA - Kira Kira * Shrine Maiden Teacher

13.TitleEnglish: HAPPY★LESSON FINAL - Atsu Atsu * A Cool Test of Courage

14.TitleEnglish: HAPPY★LESSON FINAL - Ufu Ufu * Mutsuki's Huge Romance

15.TitleEnglish: HAPPY★LESSON FINAL - Yare Yare * Happy Closure!

16.TitleEnglish: Episode 11.5 - Nice and Warm! All Alone with Kanna
16.SummaryEnglish: Bonus episode on the third DVD, originally from Happy Lesson Advance.

1.SummaryEnglish: We meet our protagonist, Chitose Hitotose, and his unusual living situation. Five teachers, each concerned for his well being, have decided to be his mother. Well, there is a parent teacher meeting coming up, so the moms decide to contest who gets to play the parent for the meeting, but nobody asked Chitose first.

2.SummaryEnglish: Mutsuki is the main character in the episode. At the begining Chitose is fighting with some other students. Then Mutsuki comes to save him. Then when she is in class she sees the score from Chitose's test (5%). She finds out about the other grades and brings a tutor  to teach him for days on end. Herself!

3.TitleEnglish: Bye Bye * Adieu, Spirit of Misfortune!
3.SummaryEnglish: Yayoi is the main focus of this episode. After seeing that Chitose as the worst luck ever, she makes it her mission to cleanse him of his ""spirit of misfortune."" However, what she does is torment him with her stubborness and determination.

4.TitleEnglish: Unsteady * WWhich Place is Big Brother's?
4.SummaryEnglish: Chitose has a life outside his mothers. He has a younger sister Minazuki, who goes to his school with him and an older sister, Hazuki, who has a ravenous appetite and she's a pop diva. When Minazuki tells Hazuki how much fun it would be if Chitose could live with them. Hazuki takes this the wrong way and so begins a series of interesting competitions for Chitose. Hazuki vs. All 5 Moms, Prize: Chitose.

5.TitleEnglish: Freezing * A Night in a Blizzard!
5.SummaryEnglish:
When the group goes to a ski resort, Satsuki and Chitose get trapped in a blizzard when the ski lesson she give him goes awry. In an avalance, Satsuki hurts her ankle, but keeps going to help her son. Meanwhile the others, except Minazuki, get completely drunk and worry for a bit.
Will Satsuki and Chitose make it back ok? Find out when you watch: Freezing - One Night In A Blizzard

6.SummaryEnglish: Yayoi: Maybe we'll meet the jungle spirit...   Mutsuki: Jungle spirit? ...How romantic...   Yayoi: *pulls out sword and whacks a flying object that comes at them while Mutsuki screams*   Mutsuki: ... *looks at it* ...It's a basin...

7.SummaryEnglish:
It's the annual sports fest for the school where the red and white team battle it out. Your basic school competition. Mutsuki and Uzuki are cheering for the white team, but Satsuke and Kisaragi are the red team advocates. Chitose and Fumitsuki (the president) are on the white team, but Minazuki is on the red team. Yayoi is indifferent being the school nurse, she's just happy if the kids don't kill eachother and wind up with only minor injuries. Mina wants to make Chitose the MVP of the school sports fest even though they are on opposite teams. The moms all band together with Mina to make Chitose MVP!
Will they suceed? Or will all their hopes fail? Find out when you watch: Exicting - Mina Does Her Best!

8.SummaryEnglish: The episode starts out with Kanna making a scheme to lead all of the females in his life hot spring in a mountain resort hotel for a one night stay. Later the next day a robot Chitose is taken instead of the real one saying only the lines ""Of course, are you kidding"", ""Hey You"", and ""Don't be ridiculous"".Meanwhile Kanna is in a disguise trying to steal Chitose in the street. But Then puppy gets ran over by a car. Kanna and Chitose are in a house together taking care of a puppy. Will she capture Chitose before the mothers get back?

9.SummaryEnglish: The Koyomi school has decreed that the grants will be eliminated for those clubs that have few members, so the group tries to recruit Chitose for their respective clubs.

11.TitleEnglish: Dizzying * The Big Transformation of Her Dreams!
11.SummaryEnglish: Chitose's Mom Kisaragi does an open experiment on herself to improve herself. The next day Kisaragi takes the characterization of Yayoi, then Satsuki, then Uzuki, then Mitsuki. Then later tells Chitose about it. Will she ever come back to normal?

13.TitleEnglish: Teary * Did I See a Secret?

1.SummaryEnglish:
In this episode, we are introduced to the family (or reintroduced as the case may be). In any case, the teachers are chosen to model new school uniforms, and Chitose is ""randomly"" chosen to be escort Mutsuki's escort. Naturally, he says no. Whats this? The new neighbor is spying, and seems to have it out for Chitose. Well, each sensei-mama throws her own flair into her time on stage. Wait! Who is this guy attacking Chitose? And why does he look so much like the new neighbor? What is their connection? And will Chitose escort Mutsuki? And what does Muuchin mean?
Find out when you watch: Pika Pika - Sparkly Uniform Show

2.SummaryEnglish:
Hmm, looks like the uniform modeled by Kisaragi won the vote. It seems the neibor has been peeking at the family's house. But why? ""It's a little suspicious,"" -Kisaragi. What's this? Chitose recieves a challenge delivered by knife message? And the new guy is attacking him? MOM TEACHERS EMERGENCY CALL TO THE ROOF! This new kid keeps being stopped mid attack by Mutsuki. His name is Nagatsuki? What is his connection to Mutsuki? And, why does he say she is his mom? And just who did he meet that knew Mutsuki?
Find out the exciting conclusion in: Bare Bare - Clearly Nagatsuki's Secret

3.TitleEnglish: Uzu Uzu * Uzuki is a Mom
3.SummaryEnglish:
Nagatsuki asks Uzuki why she is Chitose's mom, and thinks ""Because it's fun,"" is an unacceptable reason. Uzuki decides to take Chitose to an amusement park because of this. Outside the park, they find Fumutsuki and Chitose has to act like he bumped into Uzuki on accident. They get split up... but wait, the girl next door is following them. What is she doing there? Then in a freak accident, a ride breaks down and a fire is started by a couple using a lighter to see the exit. Oh no! A mother and her son are trapped! Can Uzuki, and Chitose save them in time? And what does Uzuki know about this girl?
Find out what happens when you see: Uzu Uzu - Impatient Uzuki is a Mom

4.TitleEnglish: Yare Yare *  A Day of Nurse's Office
4.SummaryEnglish:
Well, looks like Yayoi has her hands full. Visitor after visitor, problem after problem. Mutsuki worries about Nagatsuki. Satsuki needs to borrow slippers. Kisaragi comes with a delivery, and stays for tea, then leaves to work on a secret. Nagatsuki visits for her health check, and gets some good advice as well. Then Nagatsuki tells Yayoi a little more than she wanted to know about Fuuchin, or father. Minazuki hurt herself in gym? Well what do you know, Hazuki is home again. Hazuki is the one that told Nagatsuki? Wait, Chitose is skipping classes? Huh? Fumutsuki is having thoughts about someone other than Chitose? Who? Uhoh, Satsuki ruined the slippers Yayoi lent her, and they were Uzuki's slippers for Cos-play. What? Chitsose has been sleeping all day?
Check out the comedy that is: Yare Yare - Well Well a Day of Nurse's Office

6.TitleEnglish: Pin Pin * Mina-Chan in Big Crisis

8.TitleEnglish: Yura Yura * Memories at the Shore

12.TitleEnglish: Naze Naze * Mutsuki Runs Away From Home
